verses.name: Exodus 33:12
verses.text: And Moses said unto the Lord, See, thou sayest unto me, Bring up this people: and thou hast not let me know whom thou wilt send with me. Yet thou hast said, I know thee by name, and thou hast also found grace in my sight.

verses.name: Exodus 33:13
verses.text: Now therefore, I pray thee, if I have found grace in thy sight, shew me now thy way, that I may know thee, that I may find grace in thy sight: and consider that this nation is thy people.

verses.name: Exodus 33:14
verses.text: And he said, My presence shall go with thee, and I will give thee rest.
